rooms.description: An expansive multi-purpose space combining the living room and dining area with Art Deco styling using geometric patterns and metallic finishes.
Spacious master bedroom featuring ample closet space and a private balcony facing east to harness positive energy while following Vastu guidelines.
Well-lit bedroom with a window for cross ventilation placed in an advantageous position according to local norms.
Comfortable guest room with access to the central courtyard for natural light and fresh air.
Additional bedroom integrated into the design ensuring privacy and adherence to budget constraints.
Efficient kitchen designed with a modern layout and Art Deco accents. Positioned in the northeast to harness positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Primary bathroom adjoining the master bedroom ensuring convenience while optimizing space usage.
A compact guest toilet placed near the entrance for easy access. Designed with cost-effective materials on a tight budget.

openings.description: Main entrance designed in an Art Deco style that welcomes positive energy and adheres to Vastu principles, ensuring proper flow of chi.
Large windows placed across the farmhouse for natural lighting and ventilation. The placement is aligned with Vastu norms to invite sunlight and fresh air.

A wide opening leading into a large central courtyard that serves as an open-air living space, promoting social interaction while ensuring privacy. The courtyard is designed with garden elements and water features.
